description.p: Gripplis are small frog-like humanoids that stand just over 2 feet tall and have mottled green-and-brown skin. Most gripplis are primitive hunter gatherers, living on large insects and fish found near their treetop homes, and are unconcerned about events outside their swamps. Gripplis are very good at traversing these swampy areas, having the ability to climb up trees, leap far distances, and breathe underwater.
Your Grippli character has the following traits.
Ability Score Increase. Your Dexterity score increases by 2, and your Wisdom score increases by 1.
Speed. Your base walking speed is 25 feet, and you have a climbing speed of 20 feet.
Darkvision. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.
Amphibious. You can breathe air and water.
Natural Concealment. You can attempt to hide even when you are only lightly obscured by foliage, water, heavy rain, falling snow, mist, and other natural phenomena.
Standing Leap. You have a long jump up to 20 feet and a high jump up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.
Swamp Stride. You ignore difficult terrain in swamps.
Weapon Familiarity. You are proficient with spears, blowguns, and nets.
Languages. You can speak, read, and write Common and Grippli.
You can breathe air and water.
